Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Mutationem.

Author: Mutationem
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Mutationem
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Mutationem
Message: Hello

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Mutationem
Message: Good thank you. And you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright. What are you up to?

Author: Mutationem
Message: Well currently I'm thinking of questions to ask you that may trip you up.

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah I see. Anything interesting yet?

Author: Mutationem
Message: I do have one idea. Would you like to hear the question?

Author: Andrew
Message: Shoot!

Author: Mutationem
Message: A woman walked past a window and saw her own reflection in the glass as well as a puppy behind the glass she was interested in buying. What did she see in the reflection that she wanted to purchase?

Author: Andrew
Message: The puppy.

Author: Mutationem
Message: And why did she want to get the puppy?

Author: Andrew
Message: I don't know. Because they are adorable?

Author: Mutationem
Message: I see. May I ask you a riddle.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not sure I'm good at those, but sure.

Author: Mutationem
Message: A box without hinges, key, or lid, yet golden treasure inside is hid. What am I?

Author: Andrew
Message: I honestly don't know.

Author: Mutationem
Message: I have one more thing to say to you when ever you are ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm ready yes. Can I have the answer though?

Author: Mutationem
Message: Maybe later. Can you please re-wright this sentence using as many similes as you can? Here is the sentence: My name is Alice and once I fell down a rabbit hole and ended up in a new, strange world.

Author: Andrew
Message: My name is Alice and once I fell down a rabbit hole as dark as your butt and ended up in a new world as strange as your mother.

Author: Mutationem
Message: Why did you choose those words?

Author: Andrew
Message: I thought they were kinda fun.

Author: Mutationem
Message: I have made my choice. What do I do now?

Author: Moderator
Message: Conversation interrupted!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Mutationem
Message: The human

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin, and then you'll have 15 minutes again after your answer.

Message: Hello!

Author: Andrew
Message: Sure!

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have comments you'd like to share, you can do that now. Otherwise you can now close this window.

Message: Will I find out if I was correct?

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have no further comment, yes

Author: Mutationem
Message: I do have one question. Are you, the Moderator, the Ai?

Author: Moderator
Message: No. I do have standard things to say though.

Author: Mutationem

Author: Moderator

Author: Mutationem
